entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
